/usr/bin/g++ CMakeFiles/Test.dir/test.cu.o CMakeFiles/Test.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o Test  ../src/librenderer.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so -lassimp /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libfreeimage.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglfw.so.3.3 -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/local/cuda-11.3/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda-11.3/targets/x86_64-linux/lib"
